Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks lost Luka Doncic to injury and have struggled recently, failing against Portland, Sacramento, and Houston.
Cleveland Cavaliers are leading the Eastern Conference and have won 8 consecutive games, with a large lead over second place Boston.
Dallas Mavericks have lost 4 previous head-to-head meetings with the Cavaliers.
Without Luka Doncic, the Mavericks face significant challenges, particularly in attack.
